title: Overall
stimulusHtml:
9 - 8 - 7 - 6: Stronger Essays

These essays will illustrate the following qualities with varying degrees of effectiveness:


Standards

  • Will have a clear, well defined thesis

  • Well-organized

  • Analyzes and discusses all parts of the question

  • May have minor errors

Indicators

  1. Discusses three appropriate developments; better essays(8/9) will identify distinct categories

  2. Gives specific examples for each of the developments

  3. Links information with a more balanced presentation

  4. Chronological focus is accurate but not necessarily sequential

5 - 4: Mixed Essays

  • Contains a thesis, perhaps superficial or simplistic

  • Addresses issue unevenly

  • Offers limited analysis/discussion

  • May contain errors, factual and/or interpretive

Indicators

  1. Includes three developments, but may focus primarily on one

  2. Gives limited or inadequate examples for development

  3. Unbalanced presentation

  4. Chronological focus may be uneven

3 - 2 - 1 - 0: Weaker Essays

These essays will demonstrate the following qualities with varying degrees:


Standards

  • Thesis minimal

  • May discuss issues with little or no analysis

  • May contain major errors

Indicators

  1. Simply restates question or misconstrue question

  2. May include three developments, but lacks specific examples

  3. Lacks awareness of chronological framework
